## HPC Spring School @ Utrecht University

Do you want to speed up your analyses or process large datasets? Then please take part in the HPC Spring School and boost your computing skills!

During this Spring School, SURF and the Research Engineering team from ITS offer a wide range of sessions spread over eight days. Each session provides in-depth training on supercomputing, ranging from introductory topics for beginners to advanced techniques for experienced users. 

The HPC Spring School will take place from Monday 12 May till Thursday 22 May at Utrecht University; all sessions are in-person events.
